bt.data

Class Bitfield

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.data.Bitfield
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalBitfield, PeerBitfield

    public abstract class Bitfield
extends Object
    Status of torrent's data.

    Instances of this class are thread-safe.

    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BitSet bitmask
      Bitmask indicating availability of pieces.
      protected ReadWriteLock lock 
      protected int piecesTotal
      Total number of pieces in torrent.

      Creates empty bitfield.
      protected Bitfield(int piecesTotal, BitSet bitSet)
      Creates a bitfield for with the bitset initially set to the passed in BitSet

    • Field Detail

      • bitmask

        protected final BitSet bitmask
        Bitmask indicating availability of pieces. If the n-th bit is set, then the n-th piece is complete and verified.

      • piecesTotal

        protected final int piecesTotal
        Total number of pieces in torrent.

      • lock

        protected final ReadWriteLock lock

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bitfield

        protected Bitfield(int piecesTotal)
        Creates empty bitfield. Useful when peer does not communicate its' bitfield (e.g. when he has no data).
        Parameters:
        piecesTotal - Total number of pieces in torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

      • Bitfield

        protected Bitfield(int piecesTotal,
                   BitSet bitSet)
        Creates a bitfield for with the bitset initially set to the passed in BitSet
        Parameters:
        piecesTotal - Total number of pieces in torrent
        bitSet - the initial values of the bitfield

    • Method Detail

      • getBitmask

        public BitSet getBitmask()
        Returns:
        Bitmask that describes status of all pieces. If the n-th bit is set, then the n-th piece is complete and verified.
        Since:
        1.7

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray(BitOrder bitOrder)
        Parameters:
        bitOrder - Order of bits to use to create the byte array
        Returns:
        Bitmask that describes status of all pieces. If the n-th bit is set, then the n-th piece is complete and verified.
        Since:
        1.7

      • getPiecesTotal

        public int getPiecesTotal()
        Returns:
        Total number of pieces in torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPiecesComplete

        public int getPiecesComplete()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that are complete and verified
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPiecesIncomplete

        public int getPiecesIncomplete()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that are not both completed and verified
        Since:
        1.7

      • isPieceVerified

        protected boolean isPieceVerified(int pieceIndex)

      • checkAndMarkVerified

        protected boolean checkAndMarkVerified(int pieceIndex)
        Marks the piece as verified and returns whether it was verified before it was marked as verified. Thread safe.
        Parameters:
        pieceIndex - the index of the piece to check and mark verified
        Returns:
        true iff the piece was marked verified for the first time

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete(int pieceIndex)
        Shortcut method to find out if the piece has been downloaded.
        Parameters:
        pieceIndex - Piece index (0-based)
        Returns:
        true if the piece has been downloaded
        Since:
        1.1

      • isVerified

        public boolean isVerified(int pieceIndex)
        Shortcut method to find out if the piece has been downloaded and verified.
        Parameters:
        pieceIndex - Piece index (0-based)
        Returns:
        true if the piece has been downloaded and verified
        Since:
        1.1

      • markVerified

        protected void markVerified(int pieceIndex)
        Mark piece as complete and verified.
        Parameters:
        pieceIndex - Piece index (0-based)
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        DataDescriptor.getChunkDescriptors()

        protected void validatePieceIndex(int pieceIndex)
